name: Waves in a Woman's
content: Multidisciplinary conference and workshop for Holistic Management of women at different life stages. It includes advances in Aesthetic Laser Practice, Cosmetic Gynecology, Surgical Laser Procedures, Aesthetic Endocrinology, Menopause Care and Regenerative Medicine. This second edition of Menopause Dubai International Congress is an assembly of laser experts and international speakers. Live demonstrations and Hands-on workshops will be carried out in University of Sharjah Clinical and Surgical Training Center. In particular, newer technologies in invasive and non-invasive laser procedures, magnetic pulse stimulation, external counterpulsation, progenitor cell micrografting and hormonal manipulations will be discussed in lectures and live demonstrations. This conference is a great opportunity for dermatologists, plastic surgeons, gynecologists, general practitioners and internists who are interested to provide integrated care in their practice. Besides the main venue of the conference, selected lectures will be provided in a traditional dhow cruise and at a desert camp.
